data.text: Kuomi ema aseponde, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Konya kendo gola e chandruok, nikech timni makare;
Bedna lwanda mar pondo,
Resa e lwet joma timbegi richo, yaye Nyasacha,
Nimar in ema isebedo genona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,
Asebedo ka ayiengora kuomi nyaka ne nywola;
Alokora gima bwogo ji mangʼeny
Dhoga opongʼ gi pakni,
Kik ijog koda ka koro ati;
Nimar wasika wuoyo marach kuoma;
Giwacho niya, “Nyasaye oseweye;
Kik ibed mabor koda, yaye Nyasaye;
Mad joma donjona lal nono ka wigi okuot;
Anto abiro siko ka an gi geno;
Dhoga biro hulo timni makare,
Abiro biro mondo anyis ji timbeni madongo,
Isepuonja nyaka aa e nyathi, yaye Nyasaye,
Kata ka ochopo kinde ma ati kendo wiya oselokore lwar,
Timni makare ochopo nyaka ei kor polo, yaye Nyasaye,
Kata obedo ni isemiyo aneno chandruok mathoth kendo malit,
Ibiro miyo duongʼ ma an-go medore
Abiro paki gi nyatiti
Abiro kok gi mor
Dhoga biro nyiso ji kuom timbeni makare
